list.jump: Type the page number to jump to, or `cancel`:

help.title: Help
help.invite: [Join]({serverInvite}) the official server or [invite nhitomi]({botInvite}) to your server.

doujinshi.title: Doujinshi
doujinshi.from: Lists all doujinshi from a source.
doujinshi.read: Shows the pages of a doujinshi.

collections.title: Collection Management
collections.show: Lists all items in a collection.
collections.add: Adds an item to a collection.
collections.remove: Removes an item from a collection.
collections.delete: Deletes a collection, removing all items in it.

oss.title: Open Source
oss.license: nhitomi is licensed under the MIT License.

notFound.usageSource: Explicitly specify source and ID, like `{example}`.

empty.title: No results
empty.message: There are no results to display.

select.message: There are multiple collections with similar names. Select collection:

delete.confirm: Are you sure to permanently delete the collection `{collection}`? (yes/no)
